website_summaries.verdict: When it comes to competing with Apple's iPod Touch media player, the Galaxy Player 4.2 is Samsung's best effort yet, but it's still playing catch-up.
pros: The Samsung Galaxy Player 4.2 offers most of the capabilities of Samsung's popular Android smartphones, minus the phone and monthly fees
cons: Both the software and the processor are relatively old by smartphone standards
Parents should know there are no safeguards included to restrict access to age-inappropriate content

customer_reviews.title: Good overall media device.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little device. A little outdated, but still a great option if you want a reasonably priced smartphone-esque device with a decent amount of storage. Pros- Price, durability, battery life, memory expansion, two speakers, GPS (can be used as a car GPS, there are offline apps for this purpose), fast WiFi. Cons- Not upgradeable to ICS, some apps aren't supported, won't play high resolution video files, camera sucks, camera has no flash, low amount of RAM so some heavy apps won't run right. I'd probably buy this again, price point being the deciding factor. However, if you're looking for a faster, better, dedicated Android media player, I'd go with a used Samsung Galaxy S II over this.
customer_reviews.author: DanL

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my iPod with this
customer_reviews.text: ...and I couldn't be happier. I like it better in every way. There is one disadvantage, or so I thought at first. I have a dock and stereo dock and an alarm clock dock for the iPod that are not compatible with this galaxy player. But I found a bluetooth transmitter/receiver at Target that I plugged into the docks and wallah - my new Galaxy connects to them wirelessly! I actually like this a lot better than docking because when I play games I can listen to the sound really loud through the dock device! Or, I can listen to music and cruise the web at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Alan

customer_reviews.title: Better than an iPod touch, I think.
customer_reviews.text: I got a refurbished Samsung Galaxy Player 4.2 to replace a defective Samsung Player 3.6" (which I sent back to the refurbisher for repair) and after three days of use this thing outperforms my friend's 32 GB iPOD touch, for sure -- it has the same quality of video and camera and plays the same audio and video codecs (including flac, the free lossless audio codec, which gives excellent sound quality). Plus, it is compatible with Google Play store AND the Amazon app store. My only complaint is that the only way to turn off the alarm is to hit the Home button -- though it does snooze okay.
customer_reviews.author: Reindeer Thistle

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Player 4.2
customer_reviews.text: This item was delivered in timely manner and in new condition. I highly recommend this vendor. The Samsung Galaxy Player 4.2 is easy to set up and use. It is very portable and easy to carry in a shirt or coat product. Graphics are excellent. For those considering this size screen (4.2"), please be aware that you do sacrifice readability to get portability. In addition, I needed to use a stylus to accurately press buttons in apps or enter text or numbers. If you don't need portability, recommend a tablet with a screen size of 7" or larger.
customer_reviews.author: Bob_B

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!! <3
customer_reviews.text: I love Samsung Galaxy Player 4.2!!! I brought the Amazon Refurbished one and it look and seems new!!! It was in great condition!!! The love the speaker, especially since they are on the front!!! But, of couse it is a bit of an older version as in the apps, like one of the apps I had before ain my phone wasn't on there... but I still absolutely do not regret getting it!!! It was everything I had hoped for!!! In addtition, I was worried that it didn't have my free texting app "textnow" but in the end, it totally had it!!! I really recommend this product and I know you would not regret it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Saranghae

customer_reviews.title: I bought 3 of them...
customer_reviews.text: Great for my kids. Plenty of games and apps. Speakers good. Netflix and Xfinity Streampix run well on them which is great for road trips if you use your phone as a hotspot. Seem quite durable so far (with a case and screen protector). Good for Skype calls and texting (kids have been using text plus to text our family members amd each other). My 5 yr old loves using voice to text which is great since he can read but cant really spell. Camera is ok but I think no flash with it. Works well to play Minecraft too. Highly recommend the $109.99 refurbished ones. They are perfect. My kids call them "phones".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I did
customer_reviews.text: Got this on Amazon's Warehouse Deals site. Glad I did!! Wonderful product. Almost new and couldn't tell if it was or not. Completely as described. Been almost two years now. Love to read books on it, listen to music, check e-mail , and it takes great daytime pictures. Indoor pic's need adequate lighting, but I've posted a number of them, so they were good enough to share. Downloaded the Talk-a-Tone app so that I could use the Galaxy Player as a phone whenever I had a Wi-Fi connection. Having problems with that app now but the Galaxy Player is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Marg

customer_reviews.title: Android 'iPod Touch'
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because Android has a free version of QuickOffice, the gString Tuner (best I've found), Mobile Metronome (best I've found), Google Maps w/GPS, Lookout security, FM radio, simple connection to my PC (no iTunes!), and other features that are either missing or deficient on my iPad - plus I can carry this with me. I have a 200-year-old Nokia phone I don't want to give up, so this Galaxy gives me the SmartPhone features the Nokia doesn't have. I knocked off a star because of the older Android 2.3 operating system.
customer_reviews.author: Blakistone

customer_reviews.title: 4.2 Inch Galaxy Player
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this galaxy player for my 16yr old brother. He wanted a cell phone so bad but I didn't want to end up with another bill to pay. So I got him the galaxy player instead and right out of the box he loves it. I was able to set up his google account with Groove IP and now he's able to use this player as a phone!. He's downloaded and installed so many games and apps already. It's perfect for him, now he doesn't have to use my phone to play games. The 4.2 inch screen is big and really nice for game play and watching videos.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Works Pretty Well...ipod killer.
customer_reviews.text: A few glitches here and there, but not a deal breaker. A great alternative to ipod, if I knew this existed 4 years ago, never would've purchased an ipod. Superior versatility, don't need retarded iTunes, "drag and drop" works seamlessly, and expendable memory is simply the best. Functionality surpasses ipod hands down. Thrilled that I never, ever have to go back to ipod. Thank you, thank you Samsung! XD
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Its good when I bought it, but later in 2 months time, first it won't play any music and (or) videos. Then next every time I turn it back on, its stopped working!!! WHY?!?!? this was a waste of money and time. To everyone else who want to buy this player, SAVE YOU DOLLARS AND YOUR DIGNITY!!!, ITS NOT WORTH IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Samsung Galaxy Player 4.2 rather than Ipod touch as it has the FM radio - able to listen to audio on the TV when I am in the gym. Very happy with purchase - works well - as some describe - a smart phone without the phone. Have added an app and now can use it for texting. Have not downloaded music on it yet. Although the software isn't the most up to date for android OS, I have not found any issues with it. Nice size screen.
customer_reviews.author: Deb S

customer_reviews.title: Great device, better than iPod
customer_reviews.text: This player is everything it says & more. It has all the features of the Samsung phone without the cost of a data plan. The Music player app is the only negative. It refuses to stop playing unless you force quit it in the maintenance area. I downloaded another one from Google Play, & it works just fine. I also added more memory. This is a better, more options, less cost, product for me than the iPod by Apple.
customer_reviews.author: Flower Child

customer_reviews.title: European version was shipped
customer_reviews.text: The European version of this device was shipped to me so I had to return it. When looking for this device in local stores I found out that nobody had it in stock and the stores told me the device was discontinued. I suppose the only stock anywhere is the EU version but I thought this was recently released. Odd to be discontinued so soon.
customer_reviews.author: JCBiker

customer_reviews.title: Great Media Device!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Samsung Galaxy Player 4.2. I needed a new mp3 player to replace my old one, but I wanted something nice. I wanted something like an Ipod touch, but not an Ipod because I don't use itunes. The Galaxy Player is perfect for that. I use it everyday and for almost anything. It is easy to use and it is fast. I can easily transfer music and other files between my galaxy and my computer. For a simple and great multi-tasking media device, this is the one to get.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: loving it
customer_reviews.text: i had both the 5 and 4.2. i love the 4.2 better.it performs better..it being a single core , i dont find it to slow, front speaker are great and it having gingerbread doesnt bother me, i can do just about most thing i can can do on my nexus. the music sounds better than my ipod....love this music player...screen looks great..movies look alsome
customer_reviews.author: M.wal

customer_reviews.title: I'm not a cell phone person
customer_reviews.text: But I do like having a pocket sized internet accessible/gps/book reader/movie theater/file holder/mp3 player/app capable/game device with expandable memory and a good battery life that's smaller and easier to tote around than a tablet- and this fits the bill perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product, always a fan of the Android devices. easy to load songs and playlists to using Windows Media Player. Wi-fi was easy to set up, giving you the Internet and access to Google Play. Purchased for my 14 yo son, it has been 2 weeks but he carries it every where and cherishes it. I did purchase a Zagg screen protector, over all seems to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Ed C

customer_reviews.title: Great refurbished item
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought a Sandisk little mp3 player that broke after 3 weeks. Spent another 90 bucks on this and there is no comparison. This is a mini tablet / music player. As long as your around wifi you can use like a computer or super phone to get email, webpages, facebook and the games are great. I take this everywhere and can usually find wifi spots easily. The sound quality may not be as good as the ipod but the extras and price more than make up for the small sound difference.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Most of the reveiws were great. My daughter had found some password locks on the player. Once set it she couldn't remember the exact combination to enter and entered wrong enteries several times and completely locked up the player. I went on to google to find out how to unlock the player. Press the power, up vol. button, and "home" button at the same time. No easy trick, but will send you to the menu to reboot. has worked really great since then.
customer_reviews.author: Carrol Mang

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I suppose Samsung discontinued making the smart mp3 player, so people would have to buy the smart phone instead. I like my stupid phone and the ridiculously low rates that go with it. I love the wifi, and can get all the info I need when we travel at restaurants and hotels. This player is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Phipps

customer_reviews.title: ipod killer
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome, it makes the ipod touch look like a joke. Other reviews list all the pros and cons, but for me the #1 advantage here is not having to spend an entire day setting up the device with an apple account, plugging into a computer, syncing with itunes, etc. Just turn it on, connect to wifi, log into your google account. Done. -1 Star for Samsung not upgrading the OS past Gingerbread.
customer_reviews.author: Falcore

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I chose this device was the front speakers and Im not disappointed at all. The sound is decent as well as the volume. The only dislike is that the glass is very fragile, I drop it once and it broke almost entirely, it still works but changing it is almost as expensive as buying one, so Im getting a new one (with a hard case and screen protector this time).
customer_reviews.author: Christel

customer_reviews.title: Still use it everyday. With the right apps, ...
customer_reviews.text: Still use it everyday. With the right apps, this device does everything a smartphone does as long as there is access to wifi. There is no monthly contract, which probably explains why it was discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. M

customer_reviews.title: very good so far.
customer_reviews.text: This thing will do everything but make phone call. Run time so far, has been around 5 solid hr before needing a chard while playing video game and such. We have been able to watch videos online for 4 hr on ours so far with the built in wy fy . this baby will connect to you phone via blue tooth as well. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Beasterfield

customer_reviews.title: NOW THIS IS A MEDIA PLAYER!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent built in speakers! They are loud and CLEAR!. Its rocking the gingerbread os which is fine. I had an iPod touch but it broke so i thought i try out an android device and man am I impressed! I love my apple products but this media player is the true definition of a media player, right out of the box. This may even persuade me to get switch to a galaxy phone. My only issue is the battery life. It's not terrible but the iPod touch battery life is better. Although this one you can replace yourself.
customer_reviews.author: B.Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Samsung 4.2" tablet.
customer_reviews.text: This is very handy. I can keep it in my purse because of the small size. Works great. I use it at the mall, library, in my back yard. Very nice item. the only thing is the battery does not hold the charge for long. Otherwise, fast and handy.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Brown

customer_reviews.title: What a player!
customer_reviews.text: I love this purchase. It does way more than I expected and does it well. I had a really good purchase experience although the refurbished one had a charging issue, it was quickly rectified. I am quite pleased and would purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: James Clark

customer_reviews.title: So far so great
customer_reviews.text: After much research and review reading I decided to get the Galaxy Player 4.2 and as of this writing I am very pleased. What is the most important to me is the sound quality of a mp3 player and I must say this GP-4.2 is over the top. I would recommend this player to those seeking quality sound - no doubt!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Salapack

customer_reviews.title: Great apple alternative
customer_reviews.text: After looking at many reviews and comparing all the information. Decided to buy this for my 14 yo son for Christmas. He has a Apple Mac book with tons of downloaded music and content he needed a newer player to make more portable. He could not be happier and absolutley loves it. He likes the ability to interchange SD cards and expand the memory(not available on ipod) and not being tied to just Apple apps. Would highly recommend to anyone looking for a new media player.
customer_reviews.author: bgball

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Like the large display, removable battery, ability to add memory and built in radio. All of these should be available on an IPod, but aren't. I can see why a leading consumer review magazine rated this product so highly.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I thoroughly enjoy my music player. It also has wireless capabilities to connect to the internet. It looks like a phone, but is an MP3 player. The MP3 player arrived before the time estimated and it was in perfect condition. I brought an extra memory card to make sure I could save all the music I want to. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget
customer_reviews.text: I just love my Galaxy player. The OS could be newer, but I mainly use it for listening to music, texting and Skype, so its no issue. The headphones that come with the player are a bit tinny, but for the price it was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin42

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: I have had many people ask me how they can get one of these MP3 players...too bad Samsung has discontinued it. I have owned it for almost a year with no problems. I love not having a contract with any internet providers.
customer_reviews.author: Schrote

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: This MP-3 player is AWESOME. I have purchased many players in the past and this one is the best for the money. My son uses it everyday and never has problems. Great quality and great value.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Madden

customer_reviews.title: WoW!
customer_reviews.text: I have had the same Ipod since 2010. I like it very much. The only thing I hated was that you had to use ITunes. Since I like Samsung products and my phone is Galaxy Note , I had to get this player. I think it's much better than the Ipod, it's lighter and you can do way more on it than Ipod. I like my options to do what I want on this player, unlike Ipod.
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Media Player!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this player for about a week already and I can already say that it is a fantastic player. I love that there are two cameras, one in the front and one in the back, it makes it easy to Skype or take pictures. I got the 4.2 and it is very easy to hold and fits easily in my pockets. It is also extremely light! I was surprised when I was holding it that it didn't feel heavy at all. It plays lots of different music and video files.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I found this thing. It's a great music player. I can download songs wherever I have wireless and play them from the cloud if I want.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Wright

customer_reviews.title: mp 3 player
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good purchase. Other mp3 player cannot compare. I bought this to have some games on a portable unit that is smaller than a tablet but bigger than a phone. This player suits my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: great product, as described in this publication and most ...
customer_reviews.text: great product, as described in this publication and most importantly get in the time provided. Thanks for your attention, I hope to buy them soon
customer_reviews.author: Edson Leal

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this for Christmas and it is a great little device. It does everything she wants and was way cheaper than an I-touch.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bridge

customer_reviews.title: Great Player and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing and have had it for several months now. I used to have an iPod but am glad I switched to the Galaxy, however that doesn't necessarily mean that I would say the Galaxy is way better than the iPod. I think it is personal preference and depends a lot on the user. However with the capability of an micro SD card and the overall functionality of the device it is really useful.
customer_reviews.author: Lowboy

customer_reviews.title: Happy!!
customer_reviews.text: Can I fill the review with hearts? It compact, light, expandable with sd, beautiful display, no monthly contract or fees, easy to use fresh out of box... Great purchase and I can't stop touching it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Krassa

customer_reviews.title: very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. One exception. Occasionally, it locks up and I have to remove the battery and restart. Everything else is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very cool player
customer_reviews.text: I just want to say this player is very well made. I love the built in speakers easy navigation awesome resolution of the screen and of course all the other handy dandy bells and whistles..
customer_reviews.author: SITHLORD

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase yet
customer_reviews.text: I have had this device for a year now and still love it. I wanted a device that preformed most of the functions of a smart phone without the annoying data packages, and this fit the bill perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy 4.2 purchased through Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 4.2 a few months ago and still learning as I go. Everything works fine and enjoy the features of wifi and the FM radio. One question I have is when I play an album from the external sd card it plays one song and stops. I have to move to next song manually which then plays that song and stops again. How do I get this to play the entire album continually through without stopping. I know if I move the album to the internal memory it plays the entire album without stopping.
customer_reviews.author: Dave 51

customer_reviews.title: way better then apple
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my grandson for christmas. he has'nt put it down since. he's a typical 7 year old and is pretty rough on things, espicially electronics. this has survived being dropped, kicked and stepped on and is still working fine
customer_reviews.author: randy thurman

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I like this Sansung MP3 player. Compact and stylish. Bring your music everywhere you go with this mp3 player!
customer_reviews.author: bemochi

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Isn't the best Android device, but for only 100 bucks it is in like new condition and it runs fair enough It just lags and gets stuck alot. Also, I can't play the games I am able to play on other android devices because its using gingerbread android and I can't update it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Much better buy than iPod Touch 4G
customer_reviews.text: I owned the 4th Gen iPod Touch. It broke really easy and had no expandable storage. The Galaxy is 20% faster, has twice the RAM, the battery lets me know the charge percent and screen is bigger. I will Touch gen4 credit that they have a pretty up to dated OS but I want a device takes punishment and does cost me and exchange + $50 more dollar to double the storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Davis

customer_reviews.title: galaxy player 4.2
customer_reviews.text: It`s a good mp3 player, is responding to all of my needs and the the Android system works good the best I ever use for mp3 player better than iPod touch the screen of 4.2 inch is amazing for me to watch videos and play games and also a good feature of this device is the front speakers giving a good sound.....
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Good, if a bit limited.
customer_reviews.text: Hampered a bit by Android 2.2, hardware and streaming capabilities are very good. As a low-end video, multi-media player, it's competent.
customer_reviews.author: Dion Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing everything
customer_reviews.text: This thing does everything except call people like a phone. (i think) It runs really smooth and I don't regret buying this at all even after having it for a year.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy player
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. It was delivered on time in the exact condition as described. My grandson loves it and uses it every day.
customer_reviews.author: G. A. Ormerod

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for our 14 year old! Came fast and was as posted! Extremely happy with the entire process!
customer_reviews.author: DesignScapes

customer_reviews.title: mine malfunctioned
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this item! i used it every day. the only problem was that it ended up malfunctioning on me and would not charge anymore! i returned it and got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: BasedShaman

customer_reviews.title: Same features - Not monthly bill
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my wife who is anti technology... I have a S3 but don't want another monthly fee on cell bill... this does everything without a cell bill.
customer_reviews.author: NC 4 Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: this device is soooo much better then the previous Ipod I had (which only lasted 1 1/2 year). The options on the galaxy are so much more. I can add memory, I can change the battery if need (cant do that on the ipod), ect. I would highly recommend this device over the competition!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Got it on sale here for 149.00. Shipped in 2 days with Prime. I love this Player. Beats itouch hands down.
customer_reviews.author: R. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: It has been running great. I have been a fan of Samsung products and this lives up to expectations. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Jim S

customer_reviews.title: Looses Google Services every few minutes....
customer_reviews.text: This device worked well for about three months and then suddenly there is a problem connecting to the Google servers. Most apps require a forced shutdown and mine requires removal of battery. Very irritating and sort of ironic since it is a google android os 2.3.6. Does not occur with my devices using google android os 4.0.x The problem seems widespread on the internet with no fix. Seems to be effecting many smartphones using os 2.3.x. Hard resets, deleting google accounts, other suggestions do not work. Cannot upgrade SGP 4.2 to any higher android os. Without a fix, device is essentially useless. Back to the iPod touches....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great backup for an iPod Touch/Smartphone.
customer_reviews.text: Features of the built in Music Player: -Great quality -Clear Album art -Lyrics on screen -Good EQ -Plays in the background while the screen is locked (most devices do that now anyways). The End. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: ChrisTheOneAndOnly :-)

customer_reviews.title: good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a few months and now it won't turn on, reset or take a charge. Spendy for the limited time I had it
customer_reviews.author: c.adams

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT CHOICE
customer_reviews.text: I am not a big tech geek but I must say I love this gadget all the way, especially for a music lover like me.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: All OK
customer_reviews.text: I think a very good and interesting, I see no better player, and I think that is better than its main competition.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Zambrano

customer_reviews.title: the best
customer_reviews.text: i order the 4.2 but got the 4.0 that just fine just as good. i use it all the time love it
customer_reviews.author: larry

customer_reviews.title: Much better than my ipod touch!
customer_reviews.text: After switching from my Ipod touch, this device is a breath of fresh air. From its bigger screen to its wonderful android operating system, I am much more satisfied with this piece of hardware than I was with anything apple has made. The speaker is pretty good, And I love that it can play .avi and .mkv video files. The GPS works great too, you just have to get a GPS app that doesn't need internet like Sygic. I am totally satisfied with this Galaxy! :D
customer_reviews.author: Lori Tooley

customer_reviews.title: Wow--totally beats an iPod touch
customer_reviews.text: Lighter. Faster. Way, way better screen size. Thinner. Easy to use. So far, I don't have any negatives on this, other than it was hard to find a cover, and hard to find screen protectors.
customer_reviews.author: Blaine Bateman

customer_reviews.title: ... she can play music use apps and it can pretty much do anything
customer_reviews.text: It's used but it's worth the price my little sister payed for she loves it she can play music use apps and it can pretty much do anything
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I just recently bought the refurbished Samsung 4.2 inch Galaxy Player, and I love it!! The applications are endless, and the product is in great condition. The packaging made it look like I was buying it new, and there are no scratches or defects. I would definitely buy refurbished again.
customer_reviews.author: Rori

customer_reviews.title: Works for what I need
customer_reviews.text: Got it for listening to online broadcasts. It has worked very well so far.It was easy to figure out for a newcomer to mobiles.
customer_reviews.author: S D Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a music player with a good speaker and this does exactly what I need it to be. Since I bought it with intent to listen to music, that is what I am basing the review on and for that it gets 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: aggressivepacifist

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awsome player!! I love the fact that it's easy to use and that it has extra storage capacity (the ipod doesn't have that) and it's also got more features like surfing the web, playing games, tons of stuff! A great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Joss

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: I did my research on this item and it hasn't disappointed. It is everything it was advertised as and I am loving the player!
customer_reviews.author: VerticalReality

customer_reviews.title: what I needed
customer_reviews.text: The Samsung 4.2 has what I was looking for all the perks without a phone contract. It prove invaluable on a trip out of country. Still learning all of it features but happy with what I've seen.
customer_reviews.author: Kecia Metoyer

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product if your not into the apple products like I am not! I love android and this is an Amazing secondary device for my music and web!
customer_reviews.author: George hunter

customer_reviews.title: Great  Player
customer_reviews.text: My kids really like the player. Worth every cent (much cheaper than and IPOD.) My complaint is the limited cases. There are none in our local stores and very limited supply online.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Good option for ipod touch
customer_reviews.text: Great product, i was looking for an ipod touch but this is a better option for price and apps in google play
customer_reviews.author: Diego C. Cifuentes Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy Media Player 4.2: Touch Killer
customer_reviews.text: Simple to operate. Has GPS, removable battery, micro-SD slot, stereo speakers, which are not available on I-Pod Touch, which costs $100 more. What else can I say. Only negative is battery life does not seem as good as a Touch.
customer_reviews.author: george564

customer_reviews.title: EXCELENTE
customer_reviews.text: MUY SATISFECHO CON LA ENTREGA DEL PRODUCTO JUSTO COMO LO ESCOGI PARA LA COMPRA, ME LLEGO A VENEZUELA COMO LO PEDI. EXCELENTE LOS RECOMIENDO
customer_reviews.author: Hunther Camacho

customer_reviews.title: great alternative to ipod touch
customer_reviews.text: Good battery life and all the features you would expect from android. Its an android phone without the phone Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford R. Green

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Samsung 4.2-Inch Galaxy Player as a gift for my son on his 13th bday. I am very happy with the investment.
customer_reviews.author: lu216

customer_reviews.title: Great For Kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 year old daughter for her birthday. I am a pretty technical guy so I read all the reviews between the Galaxy and the IPOD Touch. Galaxy appeared to have more features at lower cost. Have had for about 1 month and has worked perfectly. My daughter loves it. Great for music, games, videos and pictures. You should see the home movies the kids make. Great resolution. Definitely recommend. Bought thru Amazon Warehouse as refurbished. Works great. No issues.
customer_reviews.author: BV

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Not as polished as the IPOD Touch, but a great product that works very well and much more flexible than the IPOD.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted an Ipod touch and instead I purchased this. I do not regret the decision. My son loves it and my daughter who has an ipod touch likes how the screen is a little bigger than her ipod touch. Will need to buy a memory card though to support the games.
customer_reviews.author: amk

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I thought
customer_reviews.text: It started off working great! I was obsessed with it and the quality of how well it was put together and ran that I got rid of my smartphone. But as time went on it started not working right. I had it for under a month and it started shutting itself off, turning my music off halfway through. I had to return it because there was no fixing the problems, even after resetting it numerous times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: audio books
customer_reviews.text: I use this for audio books. I also have 2 ipod touches. The ipods are much simpler to use with audio books and their battery doesn't drain as fast as this Samsung
customer_reviews.author: Veterannz

customer_reviews.title: Pretty crappy player
customer_reviews.text: Pretty crappy player. Malfunctioning now and plays randomly. Also has no volume limiter built in and occasionally ear blasts you randomly. Also the touch screen is very flimsy, requiring a heavy touch. Would definitively not recommend buying this. Not a good product
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Wei

customer_reviews.title: Love this tablet
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I wanted - small enough to fit in shirt pocket, removable external microSD card & battery, no phone (don't want data plan charges). Seeing it, my wife wanted one to go in her purse.
customer_reviews.author: L R

customer_reviews.title: Love it alot.
customer_reviews.text: WiFi is outstanding. Music playback is great. Very versatile. Awesome on a long distance trip. Don't need an Ipod, I have a Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Kahlill

customer_reviews.title: Great Player But Be Advised
customer_reviews.text: This is a UK version, so be advised if your in the US updates are on the UK Samsung site .
customer_reviews.author: Married in GA

customer_reviews.title: Bye Bye IPOD
customer_reviews.text: After my IPOD basically crapped out, I looked high and low for a replacement. Thought about another IPOD. Then I saw this. Bought it. Love it. Added 32GB SD Card for extra storage and now have a gigantic library of music on this thing. Better yet, the external speaker is so good that you dont even need headphones. Great. Apps play great too.
customer_reviews.author: Tom in NY

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to the omnipresent ipod stuff
customer_reviews.text: ... my son is still finding new ways to enjoy this device, and putting my iPod (3rd Gen, yeah I know...) to shame
customer_reviews.author: John Atchinson

customer_reviews.title: White phone
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was black. I thought I ordered a black one, but it is good other than that. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: KJR

customer_reviews.title: Just a little bummed about this product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this item for our daughter and she was so excited when she received it in the mail. We researched this product against the 4.0 and 5.0 and this was the one. However, she has had it for two months and there are no good cases available. I would beware if you are purchasing this item for a child because your case options are VERY limited. Even the associates at Best Buy were baffled because the store only offers 1 style and it is nothing like the otter box.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware - I was sent a British model
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because the price dropped $30. I used the Discover Card for next day delivery. What I received was a white (not black) unit that had a UK BS1363 power plug. Why in the world would Amazon sell this in the US???? I called Customer Service and they tried to get me to keep it by sending a free adaptor plug. No way. This is going back. I would not expect this 'bait and switch' from Amazon. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Average Product at Best
customer_reviews.text: The operating system needs an update an no patches come through. The battery is horrible and runs low on charge very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Buerger

customer_reviews.title: Just buy a smart phone. it is without the ability to place calls.(Unless you use an app & wifi)
customer_reviews.text: This is basically a smart phone without 3g. etc for begin sold as an MP3 player it's really an after thought.. Sure you can put a lot music on it. with a 32GB mircosd plus the around 6GB internal.. & you can use the spotify app.. but it downloads music to the internal memory.. See no way to change it possibly for copyright reason? Anyway you can only download like two list if they contain a lot of songs. I decided to buy this. & may bite the bullet an upgrade to a smartphone someday..
customer_reviews.author: Helaku

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know screen was cracked when I made the order and was a little disappointed because it was a gift for someone.
customer_reviews.author: Wandera J. Carroll

product_meta.title: Samsung 4.2-Inch Galaxy Player (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
Freedom just got more fun and portable with the Samsung Galaxy Player. Easily connect to Wi-Fi hotspots anywhere to get instant access to games, music, videos, and more. And with the Galaxy Player's Android platform, a world of apps is a touch away. 

Features Operating Platform - Android 2.3.5 (Gingerbread) CPU - 1GHz Processor Display - 4.2-inch WVGA (480 x 480) TFT LCD with Multi-Touch Storage - 8GB Media Memory - microSD media (up to 32GB) Camera - VGA Front & 2MP Rear Connectivity - 802.11 b/g/n Wi-Fi, Bluetooth v3.0 (A2DP & AVRCP), USB 2.0, Samsung Kies Special Features - GPS, FM Radio, Built-in Speaker & MIC, Multi Touch with Zoom, Multi Tasking Battery - 1500mAh Rechargeabel Battery (approx. 60-hr for music & 8-hr video playback) OS compatibility - Windows XP SP2/Vista/7 Size (WxHxD) - 2.6 x 4.89 x 0.35 in. Weight - 4.0 oz.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars187 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
